abstract: The purpose of this chapter is to provide guidelines on how to introduce demand stimulation targets and policies in national broadband plans and national ICT planning in general. Some of the terms presented in this chapter are closely linked to concepts introduced in modules 1—Policy Approaches to promoting Broadband Development and 3—Law and Regulation for a Broadband World.
meta: In book: Driving Demand for Broadband Networks and Services (pp.295-305)
